verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, saying unto <S%H559>them<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2063>These<s%> are the <S%H2416>animals<s%> which you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> among all the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are on the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Whatever <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and is <S%H8156>clovenfooted<s%>, and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, among the <S%H929>animals<s%>, that shall you <S%H398>eat<s%>.

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%> these shall you not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, or of them that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>: as the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, because he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
And the <S%H8227>coney<s%>, because he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
And the <S%H768>hare<s%>, because he <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, but <S%H6536>divides<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; he is unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.
And the <S%H2386>pig<s%>, though he <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and be <S%H8156>clovenfooted<s%>, yet he <S%H1641>chews<s%> not the <S%H1625>cud<s%>; he is unclean to <S%H2931>you<s%>.
Of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall you not <S%H398>eat<s%>, and their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall you not <S%H5060>touch<s%>; they are unclean to <S%H2931>you<s%>.

These shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: whatever has <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and in the <S%H5158>rivers<s%>, them shall you <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And all that have not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and in the <S%H5158>rivers<s%>, of all that <S%H8318>move<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and of any <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>thing<s%> which is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, they shall be an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>:
They shall be even an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto <S%H398>you<s%>; you shall not eat of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, but you shall have their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> in <S%H8262>abomination<s%>.
Whatever has no <S%H5579>fins<s%> nor <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, that shall be an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.

And these are they which you shall have in <S%H8262>abomination<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%>; they shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>: the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H6538>ossifrage<s%>, and the <S%H5822>ospray<s%>,
And the <S%H1676>vulture<s%>, and the <S%H344>kite<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>;
Every <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>;
And the <S%H1323>owl<s%>, and the night <S%H8464>hawk<s%>, and the <S%H7828>cuckow<s%>, and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And the little <S%H3563>owl<s%>, and the <S%H7994>cormorant<s%>, and the great <S%H3244>owl<s%>,
And the <S%H8580>swan<s%>, and the <S%H6893>pelican<s%>, and the gier <S%H7360>eagle<s%>,
And the <S%H2624>stork<s%>, the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H1744>lapwing<s%>, and the <S%H5847>bat<s%>.
All <S%H5775>birds<s%> that <S%H8318>creep<s%>, <S%H1980>going<s%> upon all <S%H702>four<s%>, shall be an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.

Yet these may you <S%H398>eat<s%> of every <S%H5775>flying<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing that <S%H1980>goes<s%> upon all <S%H702>four<s%>, which have <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, to <S%H5425>leap<s%> <S%H2004>with<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

Even these of them you may <S%H398>eat<s%>; the <S%H697>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the bald <S%H5556>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H2728>beetle<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>.
But all other <S%H5775>flying<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things<s%>, which have <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%>, shall be an abomination unto <S%H8263>you<s%>.
And for these you shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.
And whoever <S%H5375>carries<s%> any of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

The carcasses of every <S%H929>animal<s%> which <S%H6536>divides<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and is not <S%H8157>clovenfooted<s%>, nor <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H5060>you<s%>: every one that touches them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> upon his <S%H3709>paws<s%>, among all manner of <S%H2416>animals<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> on all <S%H702>four<s%>, those are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto <S%H5060>you<s%>: whoever touches their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And he that <S%H5375>carries<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>: they are unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

These also shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you among the creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; the <S%H2467>weasel<s%>, and the <S%H5909>mouse<s%>, and the <S%H6632>tortoise<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And the <S%H604>ferret<s%>, and the <S%H3581>chameleon<s%>, and the <S%H3911>lizard<s%>, and the <S%H2546>snail<s%>, and the <S%H8580>mole<s%>.

These are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among all that <S%H8318>creep<s%>: whoever does <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H4194>them<s%>, when they be dead, shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And upon whatever any of <S%H4194>them<s%>, when they are dead, does <S%H5307>fall<s%>, it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; whether it be any <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, or <S%H899>clothes<s%>, or <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or <S%H8242>sack<s%>, whatever <S%H3627>vessel<s%> it <S%H4399>be<s%>, where any work is <S%H6213>done<s%>, it must be <S%H935>put<s%> into <S%H4325>water<s%>, and it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>; so it shall be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>.
And every <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, whereinto any of them <S%H5307>falls<s%>, whatever is in it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; and you shall break <S%H7665>it<s%>.

Of all <S%H400>food<s%> which may be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, that on which such <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: and all <S%H4945>drink<s%> that may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in every such <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; whether it be <S%H8574>oven<s%>, or <S%H3600>ranges<s%> for <S%H5422>pots<s%>, they shall be broken down: for they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, and shall be unclean unto <S%H2931>you<s%>.

Nevertheless a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> or <S%H953>pit<s%>, where there is <S%H4723>plenty<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, shall be <S%H2889>clean<s%>: but that which <S%H5060>touches<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
And if any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon any <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> which is to be <S%H2232>sown<s%>, it shall be <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
But if any <S%H4325>water<s%> be <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and any part of their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> on <S%H2931>it<s%>, it shall be unclean unto you.

And if any <S%H929>animal<s%>, of which you may <S%H402>eat<s%>, <S%H4191>die<s%>; he that <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> there shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And he that <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>: he also that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.
And every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>; it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.

Whatever <S%H1980>goes<s%> upon the <S%H1512>belly<s%>, and whatever <S%H1980>goes<s%> upon all <S%H702>four<s%>, or whatever has <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> among all creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, them you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%>; for they are an <S%H8263>abomination<s%>.

You shall not <S%H8262>make<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> with any creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%>, neither shall you make yourselves <S%H2933>unclean<s%> with <S%H2930>them<s%>, that you should be defiled thereby.

For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: you shall therefore sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves<s%>, and you shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%>; for I am <S%H6918>holy<s%>: neither shall you <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> with any manner of creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H5927>brings<s%> you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: you shall therefore be <S%H6918>holy<s%>, for I am <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H929>animals<s%>, and of the <S%H5775>bird<s%>, and of every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and of every <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H8317>creeps<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

To make a <S%H914>difference<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and between the <S%H2416>animal<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%> and the <S%H2416>animal<s%> that may not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
